name: [LD49] I can't remember
description:
it’s a psychedelic horror FPS puzzle platformer game.

WASD to move 
Mouse to look
Space to Jump
Left Shift to Sprint
*You can double jump
F to interact

 With a twist at the end. You are trying to remember a number, to do that, you need to find it. The setting is during a nuclear collider testing launch, i think.

What to do: Go out of your room, find a place with 6 cubes with numbers, then go back and search the map for small hidden cubes with answers. When you find the right number - go back to the big cubes and select(f) the answer. There are total 7 answer cubes that may have the answer. Each time you play the game the answer will be in a different cube(replayability lol).

You are also pretty unstable, and looking at weird things makes you go crazy. (Mentally unstable) 

chesiq: game design, programming, shaders, 3d models
nastynastia: 3d models, textures, ui 

software: unity, blender, textures + face (online random gen)
